disclosures.label: Voice
disclosures.text: We don't have the redistribution licence, but you could copy SLVoice, libortp.dylib, & libvivoxsdk.dylib from SL viewer's Resources folder to Megapahit's.

disclosures.label: Privacy
disclosures.text: The viewer sends data only to Second Life.

disclosures.label: Accounts
disclosures.text: Our Bugzilla may require an account made, but you are not required to make any in order to use the viewer.

disclosures.label: Yet a new logo!
disclosures.text: Thalassocracy is the theme, hence the Jolly Roger logo. By Secret Foxtail.

disclosures.label: Bug fixes and improvements
disclosures.text: Credentials are now saved. Texture blurring/thrashing is reduced significantly on macOS, FPS counter & other improvements in performance by observeur Resident. Adjusted rear view offset & accordions for credits by Secret Foxtail.

disclosures.label: Maintenance-X
disclosures.text: Parity to SL viewer default release.

disclosures.label: New looks!
disclosures.text: New skin and icons by Secret Foxtail.

disclosures.label: NVIDIA VRAM detection
disclosures.text: Applies on FreeBSD & GNU/Linux distros, with anticipation for proprietary AMD drivers too.
